articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Xi Jinping, president of the People's Republic of China, on Mar. 23.
					 Xi Jinping, in the message, expressed his heartfelt thanks to Kim Jong Un for having sent a congratulatory message to him upon his reelection as president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission.
					
					 The message said that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is a valuable wealth common to both sides.
					
					 I will highly value the development of the Sino-DPRK ties, steadily carry forward the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship together with you and am ready to propel the stable and sound development of the bilateral ties and make efforts to provide better happiness to the peoples of our two countries and peoples, added the message.
					
					 It wished the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.
					
					 It also wished Kim Jong Un good health and hoped that every thing would go well.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Baku
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Baku
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho arrived in Baku on Wednesday to participate in the foreign minister's meeting of the non-aligned movement to be held in Azerbaijan.

articles.title: Great Leaders' Exploits for Great National Unity Introduced by CPRC
articles.content:
Great Leaders' Exploits for Great National Unity Introduced by CPRC
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK issued a memorandum Thursday to convey the peerlessly great men's exploits for great national unity on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country".
					 The memorandum said Kim Il Sung is a peerless patriot who set forth his original idea of great national unity and consistently applied it in the whole period of his revolutionary leadership and thus provided the powerful driving force of national reunification.
					
					 He found the essential way for settling national issues in the great national unity from the firm Juche-oriented view and made great efforts to realize the country's reunification by the united efforts of the nation, it noted.
					
					 Since the first day of national division by outsiders, he regarded the great national unity as the mainstay for national reunification and worked heart and soul to get all the compatriots united under the banner of patriotism, it pointed out.
					
					 It said that with his boundlessly broad magnanimity, he warmly treated and put forward those who hoped for national reunification on the road of reunification and patriotism without questioning their political view, ism and inglorious past.
					
					 It noted that leader Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly great sage who successfully embodied Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity.
					
					 It stressed that he perfectly acquired Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity at the noblest level and further developed it in depth as required by the new times.
					
					 It said that he advanced more dynamically the cause of great national unity true to Kim Il Sung's intention and behests.
					
					 It noted that he ushered in a fresh phase of great national unity with his far-sighted plan for national reunification, boundlessly broad magnanimity and warm fraternity.
					
					 It pointed out that the cause of national reunification associated with the careers of the great leaders has greeted a fresh turning phase under the outstanding and tested guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is another prominent great man and peerless patriot.
					
					 It said Kim Jong Un is the great lodestar of national reunification who is ushering in a fresh era of independent reunification by invariably maintaining and carrying forward the great leaders' idea and line of great national unity.
					
					 It noted that he clarified realistic methods for preventing mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south daily-escalating due to vicious anti-DPRK moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad, creating the climate of reconciliation and unity and ushering in a fresh heyday of national reunification, and energetically steered the campaign for realizing it.
					
					 It stated Kim Jong Un who possessed the great leaders' noble love for the nation and great virtues warmly treated south Korean personages and overseas compatriots and led them to the road of great national unity.
					
					 It stressed that he is making a radical turn in the inter-Korean relations with his noble intention of great national unity and bold decision.
					
					 Indeed, the rosy future of great national unity and national reunification lies in holding Kim Jong Un's patriotic idea and intention, it added.

articles.title: First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition Opens
articles.content:
First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition Opens
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition opened with due ceremony at the Moranbong Theatre on Thursday.
					 Attending it were Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture who is chairman of the organizing committee of the competition, officials concerned, creators and artistes of national art organizations and teachers and students of art educational bodies, Pyongyangites, foreign artistes, international jury members and honorary guests.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomats and representatives of international bodies and officials of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam said in his opening address that the competition would contribute to further raising the level of artistic representation of Korean and world famous songs and developing international cultural and art exchange and cooperation.
					
					 Mario Antonio Diaz Varas, professor of Mozarteum University in Salzburg, Austria who is international jury member, in his congratulatory speech expressed belief that the competition would become a good opportunity of boosting art exchange and cooperation among countries and deeply impressing Korean people and world music lovers.
					
					 Then the international jury members were introduced and the order of singers for the competition was read out there.
					
					 The participants enjoyed a concert given by the National Symphony Orchestra to congratulate the opening of the competition.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid at Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid at Friendship Tower
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Chinese embassy here laid a floral basket before the Friendship Tower on Thursday on the occasion of Chongmyong (one of the 24 seasonal divisions in Korea).
					 Present at the floral basket-laying ceremony were officials concerned and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy and Chinese guests.
					
					 Placed at the tower were floral baskets in the names of the Chinese embassy and various Chinese delegations.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of Urban Management, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the DPRK-China Friendship Association and the Pyongyang City People's Committee.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers before going round the tower.
					
					 Then, they visited the Songhung Revolutionary Site in Hoechang County, South Phyongan Province and laid floral baskets at the cemetery of martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers there.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Marathoners of Morocco, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Ethiopia and Uganda arrived here on Thursday to participate in the 29th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Stand on Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Stand on Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent and steadfast stand of the DPRK to advance along the path of independence, socialism and independent reunification without the slightest vacillation under any changing situation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Thursday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 A dramatic turn is taking place in the relations between the north and the south of Korea and the situation on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the consistent stand of the DPRK on independent reunification.
					
					 The DPRK's Juche-based line of national reunification is the most just line as it reflects the aspiration and demand of all the countrymen in the north and the south and overseas for the reunification of the country, peace on the Korean peninsula and the prosperity of the nation.
					
					 No one can substitute in accomplishing the cause of national reunification and it can be achieved only by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it.
					
					 The DPRK has worked hard to reunify the country by the concerted efforts on the principle of national independence while rejecting outside forces opposed to reunification. The patriotic efforts of the DPRK to reunify the country independently under the unfurled banner of national independence have garnered support and approval of all the countrymen and it has become the factor of propelling the victorious advance of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 History and reality clearly prove how just the DPRK was when it has pushed ahead with the building of a socialist powerful nation and the cause of national reunification along the immutable orbit by taking the principle of independence as the lifeline.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever more dynamically advance along the road of independence and socialism and work hard to write a new history of independent reunification By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Can Never Block Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Can Never Block Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Japan, vociferating about the "effectiveness" of its unilateral sanctions against the DPRK, made a decision that all foreign ships entering it should regard it a duty to make "a report on records of portcall on north Korea." It also decided to fine those concerned and inflict legal punishment such as prison sentence on them in case ships which dropped in at Korea enter ports of Japan after concealing the fact.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary terms it a useless act which can be made only by the islanders politically ignorant and senseless to the times.
					
					 With no desperate efforts can the Japanese reactionaries ever block the advance of the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan is trying to provoke the DPRK through unilateral sanctions while following the U.S. but it is as foolish as trying to pluck a star from the sky.
					
					 We will never allow any slightest act of violating the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should seriously pay heed to this warning of the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Farce
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Farce
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, there took place the so-called ceremony of marking the day of defending the West Sea in south Korea. The ceremony was held at "Hyonchung Cemetery in Taejon" with the sinking of warship Cheonan as a momentum. Heard from the event were very provocative remarks: "The West Sea is exposed to a constant threat from the north," "south Korea has not allowed even an inch of waters in the West Sea to intrude into and will not abandon it in future, too".
					 On March 26, the eighth anniversary of the sinking of warship Cheonan, the 1st Fleet Command of the south Korean Navy staged a marine mobile drill with at least ten warships involved in the East Sea and the 2nd fleet incited anti-DPRK hysteria among its seamen in the plaza before the warship Cheonan exhibition.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says that such confrontational farce sparks off serious concern at home and abroad as it is an unpardonable provocation seriously harming peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is known widely to everybody that the sinking of warship Cheonan was a product of the Lee Myung Bak's group's scenario for plots, confrontation and war.
					
					 Lurking behind such anti-DPRK farce is a cynical ploy to incite mistrust, antagonism and hostility among fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is needless to say that very dangerous is a double-dealing tactics of paying lip-service to "dialogue" and "improvement of relations" while slandering the dialogue partner. If such confrontational farce is allowed to go on, nobody can expect the smooth development of the situation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to properly face up to the reality and stop such rash act in the crucial times as now.
					
					 A reckless act is bound to always scuttle a plan.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Human Rights Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Human Rights Remarks Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Heard in south Korea were such remarks as the "improvement of human rights situation", "sustained efforts of the international community" and "welcome" of the "resolution on human rights in the north" fabricated at the 37th meeting of the United Nations Human Rights Council.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says this is a serious politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and unpardonable act of vitiating the atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					 The unreasonable "resolution on human rights in the north" allegedly welcomed by the south Korean authorities is a vicious mud-slinging at the dignity and system of the DPRK and unpardonable challenge to the dialogue partner, the commentary says and goes on:
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the south Korean authorities are seriously rattles the nerves of the DPRK, their dialogue partner, with the non-existent "issue of human rights".  Are they going to negotiate with whom and improve relations with whom while malignantly slandering the dignity and system of the DPRK?
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that reckless remarks on "human rights" rattling the nerves of their dialogue partner under the present situation where everything is just a beginning are an act of following in the footsteps of the former conservative regime engrossed in the anti-DPRK "human rights" smear campaign to realize its sinister aim, and will entail irrevocable consequences.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to hold dear the atmosphere of warming the inter-Korean relations and the phase of reconciliation and think twice and behave themselves.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Indonesian Figure
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on March 20 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said that Kim Il Sung put an end to the Japanese imperialists' military occupation, accomplished the historic cause of national liberation and defended the country's sovereignty from the U.S. imperialists' aggression.
					
					 He is the founding father of socialist Korea who turned the DPRK into a country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence and tender-hearted father of the Korean people who devoted his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness all his life, the statement said.
					
					 It noted that he made a great contribution to the development of the friendly ties between Indonesia and the DPRK and the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.
					
					 His great exploits will be deeply cherished in the minds of the Korean people and world progressives, it added.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Denmark
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Copenhagen on Mar. 27.
					 H. Jacobsen, member of the leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed on Mar. 28.
					 B. Baigalmaa, executive chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It fixed a celebration period from Mar. 28 to April 20 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as meeting, seminar, film show and photo exhibition in praise of the feats of the President in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio mensaje de respuesta que le enviara el 23 de marzo el Presidente de la Republica Popular China, Xi Jinping.
					En su misiva, el dignatario chino expreso sincero agradecimiento por el mensaje congratulatorio enviado por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un con motivo de su reeleccion como Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de su Comision Militar Central.
					
					Tras reafirmar que la tradicional amistad China-Corea es el valioso patrimonio comun de ambas partes, expuso su posicion de apreciar muchisimo el desarrollo de las relaciones China-Corea.
					
					Manifesto la voluntad de esforzarse junto con el Maximo Dirigente por dar continuidad a la tradicional amistad entre los dos paises, impulsar las relaciones bilaterales para que estas se desarrollen estable y sanamente en largo tiempo y proporcionar la mejor felicidad a los dos paises y pueblos.
					
					Formulo votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad del pueblo coreano y deseo que el Maximo Dirigente tenga buena salud y se le vayan bien todas las cosas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al reelecto presidente egipcio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al reelecto presidente egipcio
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion a Abdel Fattah al-Sisi con motivo de su reeleccion como presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto.
					Convencido de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises, el remitente hizo votos por mayores exitos en las tareas del destinatario para lograr la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: Delegacion del gobierno de la RPDC llega a Baku
articles.content:
Delegacion del gobierno de la RPDC llega a Baku
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- La delegacion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el canciller Ri Yong Ho, llego el dia 4 a Baku para participar en la reunion de los cancilleres del Movimiento de los No Alineados que sesionara en Azerbaijan.

articles.title: CRPP publica memorando sobre hazanas de lideres coreanos
articles.content:
CRPP publica memorando sobre hazanas de lideres coreanos
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 25o aniversario de publicacion de la obra del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Programa de diez puntos de la gran unidad pannacional para la reunificacion de la patria", el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria de la RPDC hizo publico el dia 5 un memorando para transmitir las hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales realizadas por la gran unidad nacional.
					El documento senala como sigue:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung es el patriota sin par quien presento la original idea sobre la gran unidad nacional y la materializo constantemente en todo el curso de su direccion sobre la revolucion, de manera que se preparara la poderosa autora de la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Asumiendo siempre la firme posicion del Juche, el considero dicha unidad como remedio principal para resolver el problema nacional y trabajo incansablemente para lograr la reunificacion del pais con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion.
					
					Desde el primer dia de la division del pais por las fuerzas extranjeras, presento la gran unidad nacional como el fundamento de la reunificacion de la patria y realizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y mentales por unir a todos los compatriotas a base del amor por la patria y la nacion.
					
					Con su incomparable magnanimidad, condujo a todas las personas aspirantes a la reunificacion de la patria al camino de reunificacion y patriotismo haciendo caso omiso de sus criterios politicos, doctrinas y hasta sus antecedentes defectuosos.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il es el gran sabio sin par quien materializo perfectamente la idea del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre la cohesion de la nacion.
					
					Al encarnarla en el nivel mas alto, el Dirigente la profundizo aun mas a las alturas de la nueva epoca.
					
					Dio impulso mas fuerte a la causa para lograrla, en acato al proposito y legado del lider antecesor.
					
					Dando pruebas de su generosidad y fraternidad, dejo abierta la nueva historia de gran unidad nacional segun su magno proyecto sobre la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Esta causa, en que estan sintetizadas las vidas de los lideres antecesores, acoge el nuevo periodo de viraje bajo la direccion sabia y diestra del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, otro gran hombre extraordinario y patriota sin par.
					
					El es el lucero que abre la nueva era de reunificacion al mantener, continuar y desarrollar invariablemente las ideas y lineas de los lideres antecesores sobre la gran unidad nacional.
					
					Dirigio incansablemente la lucha por implementar los remedios practicos declarados al interior y exterior para eliminar la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur, que se agravan cada vez mas debido a la brutal campana anti-RPDC de las fuerzas internas y externas anti-reunificacion, crear el ambiente de reconciliacion y unidad y abrir la nueva era de esplendor para la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Con el mismo amor a la nacion y grandes virtudes que tenian los grandes Lideres, Kim Jong Un acogio cordialmente a las personalidades surcoreanas y los coreanos residentes en ultramar y les guio a la senda de gran unidad nacional.
					
					Gracias a su noble proposito y magnanima decision, se producen hoy dia cambios dramaticos en las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					En apoyar la idea y el proposito patriotico del Maximo Dirigente hay la via de gran unidad nacional y el futuro prometedor de la causa de reunificacion.

articles.title: Inaugurado Primer Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurado Primer Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 5 en el capitalino Teatro Moranbong el Primer Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang.
					En la ceremonia inaugural tomaron parte Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura y presidente del comite organizador del evento, los funcionarios interesados, los creadores, artistas, profesores y estudiantes de las entidades artisticas centrales y los organos de educacion de arte, los trabajadores capitalinos, los artistas extranjeros, los jueces internacionales y los huespedes honorarios.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en Corea.
					
					En su discurso de apertura, Pak Chun Nam dijo que el presente concurso elevara mas el nivel de interpretacion artistica de las musicas famosas de Corea y del mundo y contribuira al desarrollo de intercambio y cooperacion internacionales en la rama de cultura y arte.
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra de felicitacion, el profesor de la Universidad Mozarteum en Salzburg de Austria, Mario Antonio Diaz Varas, quien es jurado internacional, expuso la esperanza de que el concurso sirva de buena oportunidad para fortalecer el intercambio y la cooperacion entre los paises en el arte y dejar profunda impresion a los habitantes coreanos y los aficionados a la musica de diferentes latitudes del mundo.
					
					Seguidamente, fueron presentados los jurados internacionales y quedo publicado el turno de actuacion de los concursantes en las categorias de ambos sexos.
					
					Los participantes presenciaron el concierto de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional ofrecido para felicitar la inauguracion del concurso.
